meanings.definition: The act of delivering something to a recipient.
meanings.sent1: The mailman made several deliveries to our house today.
meanings.sent2: The company offers fast and reliable deliveries of their products.
meanings.sent3: The deliveries were so frequent that our dog thought the mailman was a new friend.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a delivery of happiness to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The deliveries arrived like clockwork, never failing to bring joy.

meanings.definition: The items or goods that are delivered.
meanings.sent1: The store received a shipment of new deliveries this morning.
meanings.sent2: Online shopping has made receiving deliveries very convenient.
meanings.sent3: The deliveries were stacked so high, it looked like a tower of surprises.
meanings.sent4: His words were a delivery of comfort in a time of need.
meanings.sent5: The delicious smell of fresh bakery deliveries filled the air.

meanings.definition: The process of giving birth to a baby.
meanings.sent1: The doctor assisted in the safe delivery of the baby.
meanings.sent2: The mother was in labor for hours before the delivery.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected early delivery caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The miracle of life is seen in every newborn delivery.
meanings.sent5: The delivery of the baby brought tears of joy to the parents' eyes.
